name: SmartVCPlayer
description: Telegram bot to stream video in telegram VC

env.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps
Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather
Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram
ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Music
ID of the group to send playlist If CHAT is a Group, if channel then leave blank

QUALITY.description: Default quality of your video player, Use one of high, medium or low.

DATABASE_URI.description: Mongo DB database URI , get from https://cloud.mongodb.com, even if this is optional, many of functions may not work if this is not set.

description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users seperated by space)
Change it to True if you want to make /play command available for everyone.
Your heroku api key, get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account/applications/authorizations/new.

STARTUP_STREAM.description: YouTube live / Direct link to a video / Telegram link to a YouTube playlist.(Read the README for more info.)

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
REPLY_MESSAGE.value: Hey, Iam a bot to play music, not having time to chat with you.
